settings.title: What is Low Carb?
settings.desc:
Low-carbohydrate diets have been shown to be effective for weight loss, improved blood sugar control, and reduced risk of chronic diseases like heart disease and diabetes.

There are many different ways to approach a low-carb diet, but the most important piece is to reduce or eliminate carbohydrates from your diet.

This can mean cutting out foods like bread, pasta, rice, potatoes, fruit, juice, and sweets completely or, you can choose to simply reduce the number of carbohydrates you eat at each meal.

settings.title: What is Low Carb Soda?
settings.desc:
Low-carb soda is a soda alternative that contains fewer carbs than its traditional counterpart.

Some low-carb sodas, like Perfy, also contain less sugar, 0g fat, 0g cholesterol, and add in nootropics and adaptogens like L-theanine + ashwagandha or turmeric to boost cognition and mood while mitigating stress and anxiety.

A benefit to using sweeteners like stevia, monk fruit, and allulose is that these sweeteners are all-natural and contain very few carbs.
